name: Sackboy: A Big Adventure - Clank Costume
summary:
Nobody does The Robot quite like Sackboy. He owns that dance on Craftworld.
So dress him up as Clank, trigger the highly entertaining dance emote and watch him go.
And why not tell your friends to download the Ratchet costume and the Rivet costume too, then you can form your own dream team and head off on thrilling intergalactic adventures!
